an2.98:1.3: Yo ca anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati, yo ca āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati.
an2.99:1.3: Yo ca anāgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati, yo ca āgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati.
an2.100:1.3: Yo ca akappiye kappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye akappiyasaññī.
an2.101:1.3: Yo ca akappiye akappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye kappiyasaññī.
an2.102:1.3: Yo ca anāpattiyā āpattisaññī, yo ca āpattiyā anāpattisaññī.
an2.103:1.3: Yo ca anāpattiyā anāpattisaññī, yo ca āpattiyā āpattisaññī.
an2.104:1.3: Yo ca adhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca dhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.105:1.3: Yo ca dhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca adhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.106:1.3: Yo ca avinaye vinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye avinayasaññī.
an2.107:1.3: Yo ca avinaye avinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye vinayasaññī.
an2.108:1.3: Yo ca na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyati, yo ca kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati.
an2.108:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.109:1.3: Yo ca na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati, yo ca kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyati.
an2.109:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.110:1.3: Yo ca akappiye kappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye akappiyasaññī.
an2.110:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.111:1.3: Yo ca akappiye akappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye kappiyasaññī.
an2.111:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.112:1.3: Yo ca āpattiyā anāpattisaññī, yo ca anāpattiyā āpattisaññī.
an2.112:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.113:1.3: Yo ca āpattiyā āpattisaññī, yo ca anāpattiyā anāpattisaññī.
an2.113:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.114:1.3: Yo ca adhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca dhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.114:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.115:1.3: Yo ca dhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca adhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.115:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.116:1.3: Yo ca avinaye vinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye avinayasaññī.
an2.116:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.117:1.3: Yo ca avinaye avinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye vinayasaññī.
an2.117:1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
